name: Coronavirus Alert Bar
author: Ryan Bracey

sections.description:
Quickly add an alert bar for COVID-19 information to your website

For a non COVID-19 specific alert bar, please check out WordPress Alert Bar

Features

  • Custom Colors to match your site branding
  • Ability to include coronavirus icon
  • Custom title, message and call to action ( all items are optional and fully conditional)
  • Ability to display banner across your entire site or just the homepage
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

Release Date – May 10 2021

  • Fix – Adjusted hook priority for WordPress Alert Bar to prevent conflict with favicons set through the WordPress Customizer.

1.0.3

Release Date – Jun 15 2020

  • Fix – Typo in readme.txt file.

1.0.2

Release Date – Jun 04 2020

  • New – Add ability to open Call to Action link in new tab.

1.0.1

Release Date – Apr 29 2020

  • Fix – Positioning issue with close icon when logged in.

1.0.0

Release Date – Apr 15 2020

  • New – Added Corona Virus Alert Bar to repository.
